books.title: VIDA EN EL AMOR

books.description: This book focuses on the idea that love is the fundamental law of life and creation, which aligns with the customer's interest in "amor". The book offers a mystical and spiritual perspective on love as the center of existence.

books.title: DE AMOR Y DE SOMBRA

books.description: Although not directly translated to English, the title suggests an exploration of both love and darkness. Isabel Allende's works often delve into themes of love, relationships, and human nature, making this book a potential match.

books.title: EL AMOR EN OCCIDENTE

books.author: VARIOS AUTORES
books.description: The mention of "Premios Hugo" in the title indicates that this book contains science fiction works. The Premios Hugo are awards given to outstanding science fiction and fantasy works, making this collection likely to contain science fiction stories.

books.title: MARTÍ BIÓGRAFO
books.author: VARIOS AUTORES
books.description: Although the title doesn't explicitly mention Mars, it includes "Marti" which is likely referring to José Martí, a Cuban national hero who wrote about exploration and travel. The subtitle suggests that the book discusses historical discourse related to exploration.

books.title: VISITOR FROM ANOTHER PLANET
books.author: GEORGE P. McCALLUM
books.description: This book's title suggests a connection to extraterrestrial life, which could be related to Mars exploration as humans often explore other planets for signs of life.

books.title: EL SAHARA. Enciclopedia de la Naturaleza-13
books.author: ADELAIDE CATALISANO Y BRUNO MASSA
books.description: While this book is primarily about the Sahara desert, it's part of an encyclopedia series that covers various aspects of nature. This could be relevant to Mars exploration as scientists study the Martian terrain and geology.

books.title: VIAJAR PERDIENDO EL SUR
books.author: RODRIGO FERNÁNDEZ MIRANDA
books.description: Although this book's title doesn't directly relate to space or Mars, it discusses tourism and globalization. This could be tangentially related to the idea of humans exploring other planets as a form of "tourism" in space.

books.title: EL YOGA Y LA TRADICIÓN HINDÚ
books.author: JEAN VARENNE
books.description: This book is a comprehensive introduction to yoga and its roots in Hindu tradition, making it a great match for customers interested in learning about the history and philosophy of yoga.

books.title: MUDRAS. El poder del Yoga en tus manos
books.author: GERTRUD HIRSCHI
books.description: As this book focuses specifically on the practice of mudras (hand gestures) in yoga, it is an excellent choice for customers looking to deepen their understanding and practice of yoga.

books.title: YOGA EN CASA
books.author: VARIOS AUTORES
books.description: With its practical approach to practicing yoga at home, this book is perfect for customers looking for accessible and convenient ways to incorporate yoga into their daily lives.

books.title: LÁ TRADICIÓN DEL YOGA
books.author: GEORG FEUERSTEIN
books.description: This extensive volume explores the history, literature, philosophy, and practice of yoga, making it a valuable resource for customers seeking a thorough understanding of yoga's evolution and development over time.

books.title: SOLITARIO DE AMOR
books.author: CRISTINA PERI ROSSI
books.description: Ediciones Grijalbo, S.A. Barcelona. 1988. 13,2 X 20 cm. 185pp. Rústica. En buen estado de conservación.Con una ligera firma con lapicero. Novela de amor , que narra como se siente una mujer amada y como el amor puede a llegar a ser amante y como se ve rechazada en la sociedad.

books.title: ESE ELIXIR LLAMADO AMOR
books.author: RAMTHA
books.description: Arkano Books, 2004, Madrid, Rústica con solapa, .23x15 cm, 245 pp. Muy buen estado. Libro que tratar de explorar la paradoja del amor reflexionando sobre la verdad de la atracción sexual, las fantasías secretas y la magia del amor verdadero.

books.title: EL AMOR EN OCCIDENTE
books.author: JACQUES SOLÉ
books.description: Librería Editorial Argos, Barcelona 1977. 363 pp, 20x13. Tapa blanda, señales paso del tiempo, buen estado. Es un repaso al amor en Occidente durante la Edad Moderna.

books.title: DE AMOR Y DE SOMBRA
books.author: ISABEL ALLENDE
books.description: Editorial Plaza y Janés S.A. 1995, Barcelóna. Rústico con solapa. 267 pp. 15X21,5. Buen estado.

books.title: VIDA EN EL AMOR
books.author: ERNESTO CARDENAL
books.description: Ediciones Sigueme. 1979. Salamanca. 169pp. 11,8x17,2cm. Cartoné. En buen estado de conservación.  Escrito por Ernesto Cardenal, este libro aborda la idea de que el amor es la ley fundamental de la vida y la creación. Cardenal, un poeta y sacerdote nicaragüense, ofrece una visión mística y espiritual del amor como el centro de la existencia.
